justification: Acknowledges B’s conservatism but misreads needs: claims TE surplus when B’s only strong TE is Noah Brown, and labels Isaiah as “steadier” despite Q tag and breakout profile. Eric Torres is boom/bust, not floor-friendly. Trade fits A’s TE need but leaves B with TE4 and swaps a Tier-1 WR for two volatile WRs. Rationale is terse and light on specifics; acceptance probability seems optimistic.
